name: Vegan Sponge Cake Recipe
description: This Sponge Cake is whole grain, soft, moist and easy. Add vanilla or zest of choice. Makes amazing layer cakes. Makes two skinny 8 inch pans. Free of Dairy, egg, yeast, nut. Can be made corn-free.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup ground raw sugar (2 Tbsp more for sweeter)
2 tsp vinegar (I use apple cider vinegar)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 365 deg F / 180ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 365 deg F / 180ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, whisk all dry ingredients and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, whisk all dry ingredients and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix flaxmeal with warm water and let sit for 2 minutes. Add the rest of the ingredients under wet, mix until the sugar is combined well.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix flaxmeal with warm water and let sit for 2 minutes. Add the rest of the ingredients under wet, mix until the sugar is combined well.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer dry to wet. Mix to just about combine. Pour the batter into greased and floured 8 inch cake pans or parchment lined pans.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer dry to wet. Mix to just about combine. Pour the batter into greased and floured 8 inch cake pans or parchment lined pans.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 35 to 40 mins or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes, then remove the cake from the pan. Cool completely before cutting into desired size for the trifle.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 35 to 40 mins or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes, then remove the cake from the pan. Cool completely before cutting into desired size for the trifle.
